name: Bomb Defuse 3D - Epic Bomber
description:
OMG! Here is a BOMB! Who can help?!
Face with a suddenly dropped bomb, as a bomb-disposal expert, can you complete the whole bomb-defusing task and save all the lives of bomb squad?
Time flies when you are indecisive. Red wire or the blue one?
Keep it cool! Find defusing clues from the bomb. Maybe you are not a hero in real life, but now, it’s your time!

Game Features:
- Epic bomb-defusing puzzles
- Contains 100+ Original designed unique bombs and all classic bombs you can name out
- Bomb, defusing clues and the code change randomly
- Unimagined defusing clues
- 3D Gameplay and Environments
- Excellent sounds effects and game effects
- One finger control. Gaming is never easy like this!
- New bombs and levels update weekly

Tik tok, tik tok…the bomb is ticking and time is running out! Open Bomb Defuse 3D and make your choice now! Red wire or the blue one?

----------
From the maker of Stump Me and Mr Spy, Stump Me 2 is your perfect choice of IQ training!
Follow us for the first news and updates:
